subject: Change of Record of Rights (RoR) by the State Governments through which the National Highways are pasing to the Central Government in Revenue Records-reg.
text: HTdf4 <7cfl4 <TTHT faorut Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 Fax 91-11-25093507/25093514 (T 4Ra67, 7EF 4artt &< 7roTAr TNTTT4) Extn 2223/2318/2468/2553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport & Highways) G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No. 11041/21/2002-Admn. December 22, 2004 23 POLICY MATTER  ~ ADMINISTRATIONFINANCE (94/2004) (Decision taken on EM Division's File No. NHAILA2O01-21) Sub: Change of Record of Rights (RoR) by the State Governments through which the National Highways are passing to the Central Government in Revenue Records The aforesaid issue was discussed in the Weekly  Meeting held on 20.10.2004 wherein it was decided that concerned Project Directors may engage the services of a retired revenue officer at PIU level for the specific assignment of change of Record of Rights at a consolidated remuneration on contract basis. 2 Necessary action may accordingly be taken at an early date SO that the work related to change of Record of Rights in the name of the Central Government in the Revenue records is done on priority. This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority: (V.K Sharma) General Manager (Admn) AIl Project Directors, PIUsICMUs CC for information to - 1 PS to Chairman 2. AIl MembersIAdviser (AB) 3. AII CGMsIGMs 4 Hindi OfficerILibrarian 7 # NHAL Reg: To,
